name: Rimworld sprite constructor
description:
This is a set of scalable components that will aid you in making your own sprites for Rimworld, colony sim game and story generator. You can create good-looking sprites without prior knowledge of vector editing tools.


The set already has proper outlines, shading, and sizes needed for consistent vanilla-friendly style, that also looks good with mods like Camera++ as it produces HD textures.


All the components are made to look vanilla-friendly, and the pixel density is 128x128 pixels for each game cell.
